column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We started off with sangria which was delectable! We then ordered a wide variety of tapas such as: bacon wrapped dates
column6: and skewered chicken and chorizo skewers. Everything was delicious; however
column7: the stars of the night were the patatas bravas and the scallops! I mean
column9: the aioli they had it with was a delicious
column10: zesty tomato aioli which had me dunking each piece of potato in the sauce! The scallops were cooked to perfection and were juicy and delectable! ALSO BONUS: free dessert with check in on yelp! We made the most of it with caramelized bananas w/ vanilla ice cream!
